class Appointment(slotId: Int, doctorId: Int, patientId: Int) {
  def getSlotId = slotId
  def getDoctorId = doctorId
  def getPatientId = patientId
  override def equals(obj: Any): Boolean = obj match {
    case that: Appointment =>
      this.slotId == that.slotId &&
      this.doctorId == that.doctorId &&
      this.patientId == that.patientId
    case _ => false
  }
  override def hashCode(): Int = slotId * 31 + doctorId * 13 + patientId
  override def toString: String =
    s"Appointment(slotId=$slotId, doctorId=$doctorId, patientId=$patientId)"
}

class ManualSong(t: String, a: String, d: Int, al: String):
  val title = t
  val artist = a
  val durationSeconds = d
  val album = al
  override def equals(obj: Any): Boolean =
    obj match
      case s: ManualSong => title == s.title && artist == s.artist && durationSeconds == s.durationSeconds && album == s.album
      case _ => false
  override def hashCode(): Int =
    title.hashCode + artist.hashCode * 31 + durationSeconds + album.hashCode * 13
  override def toString: String = s"ManualSong($title, $artist, $durationSeconds, $album)"

class FilteredContent(val contentId: String, val moderatorId: String, val moderationReason: String) {
  def canEqual(that: Any): Boolean = that.isInstanceOf[FilteredContent]
  override def equals(other: Any): Boolean = other match {
    case that: FilteredContent =>
      (that canEqual this) &&
      contentId == that.contentId &&
      moderatorId == that.moderatorId &&
      moderationReason == that.moderationReason
    case _ => false
  }
  override def hashCode: Int =
    contentId.hashCode ^ moderatorId.hashCode ^ moderationReason.hashCode
  override def toString: String =
    s"FilteredContent($contentId, $moderatorId, $moderationReason)"
}

case class MortgageDetails(principal: Double, annualInterestRate: Double, loanTermYears: Int)
def monthlyPayment(mortgage: MortgageDetails): Double =
  val monthlyRate = mortgage.annualInterestRate / 12 / 100
  val n = mortgage.loanTermYears * 12
  val numerator = mortgage.principal * monthlyRate * math.pow(1 + monthlyRate, n)
  val denominator = math.pow(1 + monthlyRate, n) - 1
  numerator / denominator
val mortgage = MortgageDetails(300000, 3.5, 30)
mortgage match
  case MortgageDetails(p, r, t) => println(s"Principal: $$p, Rate: $$r, Years: $$t")
println(f"Monthly payment: $$${monthlyPayment(mortgage)}%.2f")

class OvertimeApproval(val staffCode: String, val approved: Boolean, val overtimeAmount: Int) {
  override def equals(obj: Any): Boolean =
    obj.isInstanceOf[OvertimeApproval] &&
    obj.asInstanceOf[OvertimeApproval].staffCode == this.staffCode &&
    obj.asInstanceOf[OvertimeApproval].approved == this.approved &&
    obj.asInstanceOf[OvertimeApproval].overtimeAmount == this.overtimeAmount
  override def hashCode(): Int =
    staffCode.hashCode + (if (approved) 1 else 0) + overtimeAmount * 13
  override def toString: String =
    s"OvertimeApproval($staffCode, $approved, $overtimeAmount)"
}

class SevereWeatherWarning(val warningType: String, val issuedAt: Long)
def canEqual(other: Any): Boolean = other.isInstanceOf[SevereWeatherWarning]
override def equals(other: Any): Boolean =
  other match
    case that: SevereWeatherWarning =>
      this.warningType == that.warningType && this.issuedAt == that.issuedAt
    case _ => false
override def hashCode: Int =
  31 * warningType.hashCode + issuedAt.hashCode
override def toString: String =
  s"SevereWeatherWarning($warningType, $issuedAt)"

class LinkStatusChange(val linkId: String, val previous: String, val current: String) {
  def canEqual(other: Any): Boolean = other.isInstanceOf[LinkStatusChange]
  override def equals(other: Any): Boolean =
    other match {
      case that: LinkStatusChange =>
        (that canEqual this) &&
        linkId == that.linkId &&
        previous == that.previous &&
        current == that.current
      case _ => false
    }
  override def hashCode(): Int =
    linkId.hashCode + 31 * previous.hashCode + 17 * current.hashCode
}

class DonorRecord(val donorName: String, val contactEmail: String, val annualContribution: Double, val recurringDonor: Boolean) {
  override def equals(obj: Any): Boolean = obj match {
    case that: DonorRecord =>
      this.donorName == that.donorName &&
      this.contactEmail == that.contactEmail &&
      this.annualContribution == that.annualContribution &&
      this.recurringDonor == that.recurringDonor
    case _ => false
  }
  override def hashCode(): Int =
    donorName.hashCode + 41 * contactEmail.hashCode +
    annualContribution.hashCode() * 13 + recurringDonor.hashCode() * 7
  override def toString: String =
    s"DonorRecord($donorName, $contactEmail, $annualContribution, $recurringDonor)"
}

def calculateMonthlyPayment(principal: Double, interestRate: Double, termYears: Int): Double =
  val monthlyRate = interestRate / 12.0 / 100.0
  val numberOfPayments = termYears * 12
  principal * monthlyRate / (1 - Math.pow(1 + monthlyRate, -numberOfPayments))

def getMonthlyPayment(optPrincipal: Option[Double], optRate: Option[Double], optYears: Option[Int]): Option[Double] =
  for
    principal <- optPrincipal
    rate <- optRate
    years <- optYears
  yield calculateMonthlyPayment(principal, rate, years)

case class WorkoutSession(durationMinutes: Int, caloriesBurned: Int)

enum WorkoutParsingError:
  case InvalidFormat, NegativeDuration, NegativeCalories

def parseWorkoutSession(str: String): Either[WorkoutParsingError, WorkoutSession] =
  str.split(",") match
    case Array(dm, cb) =>
      for
        d <- dm.toIntOption.toRight(WorkoutParsingError.InvalidFormat)
        c <- cb.toIntOption.toRight(WorkoutParsingError.InvalidFormat)
        _ <- if d >= 0 then Right(()) else Left(WorkoutParsingError.NegativeDuration)
        _ <- if c >= 0 then Right(()) else Left(WorkoutParsingError.NegativeCalories)
      yield WorkoutSession(d, c)
    case _ => Left(WorkoutParsingError.InvalidFormat)

def calculateProgress(stepsStr: String, goalStr: String): Either[ProgressCalculationError, Double] =
  for
    steps <- stepsStr.toIntOption.toRight(ProgressCalculationError.InvalidSteps)
    goal <- goalStr.toIntOption.toRight(ProgressCalculationError.InvalidGoal)
    if goal > 0
  yield steps.toDouble / goal

sealed trait InventoryError
case object ProductNotFound extends InventoryError
case object InsufficientStock extends InventoryError

def withdrawStock(products: List[Product], id: String, qty: Int): Either[InventoryError, Product] =
  products.find(_.identifier == id) match
    case Some(product) if product.stock >= qty =>
      Right(product.copy(stock = product.stock - qty))
    case Some(_) =>
      Left(InsufficientStock)
    case None =>
      Left(ProductNotFound)

def reserveItem(inventory: Map[String, Item], itemId: String, qty: Int): Either[StockError, Item] =
  inventory.get(itemId) match
    case None => Left(ItemNotFound)
    case Some(item) if item.quantity < qty => Left(OutOfStock)
    case Some(item) => Right(item.copy(quantity = item.quantity - qty))

  records.find(_.id == id) match
    case None => Left(RetrievalNotFound)
    case Some(it) if it.available < amount => Left(RetrievalInsufficient)
    case Some(it) => Right(it.copy(available = it.available - amount))

def redactProfanities(text: String): Option[String] =
  val words = text.split(" ")
  val profanities = Set("badword", "offensive")
  val found = words.exists(profanities.contains(_))
  if found then Some(words.map(w => if profanities.contains(w) then "***" else w).mkString(" ")) else None

sealed trait InputValidationError
case object InvalidInterestRate extends InputValidationError

def calculateMonthlyPayment(loanAmount: Double, annualRate: Double, termInYears: Int): Double =
  if loanAmount <= 0 || annualRate <= 0 || termInYears <= 0 then
    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid mortgage input values.")
  else
    val monthlyRate = annualRate / 12.0 / 100.0
    val totalPayments = termInYears * 12
    loanAmount * monthlyRate / (1 - Math.pow(1 + monthlyRate, -totalPayments.toDouble))
